abstract_ssm: A typewritten teleplay for an episode of the television series Brooklyn Bridge, dated 1991. Brooklyn Bridge aired on the CBS network from 1991 to 1993. The series depicted a Jewish family living in Brooklyn during the mid-1950s. The teleplay is for an episode titled, When Irish Eyes Are Smiling. Included with the teleplay is a clipping of an article about the series from the New York Times, dated 1991.
corpname_ssm: Columbia Broadcasting System, Inc. CBS Television

name_sim: Columbia Broadcasting System, Inc. CBS Television
